item.title: Review CW16
item.description: This post is a bit late, however, better than missed out.

item.title: Review CW14
item.description: This last week was suffered the typical post-easter slowness. It takes some time to get back to business as usually.

item.title: Review CW13
item.description: Happy Easter everyone! The past week was rather low in activity due to my health and the health of other around.

item.title: Review CW11
item.description: Currently, I’ve halted most of these project to favor to get my CI/CD back.

item.title: Review CW10
item.description: Another week has gone by, and I did not get that much done as I was hoping for.

item.title: Review CW07
item.description: This week was the worst in terms of writing. This is to the fact, that I had to care for someone and wasn’t able to take the time I needed for writing.

item.title: Review CW06
item.description: Oh, boy this was a troublesome week. I quite got lost in clean up and some rather emotional topics.

item.title: Review CW5
item.description: This week was very difficult in writing. I’ve got lost in the details and then there was life.

item.title: Review CW4
item.description: This week the first difficulties in writing every arise. Basically, I’m missing the necessary time to get things done.

item.title: Review CW3
item.description: Yesterday was the first day I did not push a blog post because, I took a break.

item.title: Review CW-2
item.description: The first week of January is completed and as every week I review what went on.
